headline: Can Upcoming Global Content Drive NFLX's Engagement in the Near Term?
summary: Netflix bets on a blockbuster global slate, from Stranger Things to live sports, to boost engagement and sustain its growth momentum this holiday season.

headline: Why Is fuboTV (FUBO) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
summary: Shares of live sports and TV streaming service fuboTV (NYSE:FUBO) jumped 5.5% in the afternoon session after the company announced it closed its previously announced business combination with The Walt Disney Company's Hulu + Live TV business.

raw.headline: Why Is fuboTV (FUBO) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
raw.summary: Shares of live sports and TV streaming service fuboTV (NYSE:FUBO) jumped 5.5% in the afternoon session after the company announced it closed its previously announced business combination with The Walt Disney Company's Hulu + Live TV business.

headline: It’s official: Fubo is combining with Hulu Live TV
summary: Fubo and Disney have officially completed the transaction to combine the live sports platform with Hulu Live TV.

headline: Sterlington Advises Fubo Management Team on Business Combination with The Walt Disney Company’s Hulu + Live TV
summary: NEW YORK, October 29, 2025--Sterlington advised the management team of FuboTV Inc. ("Fubo") on executive compensation matters in its business combination with The Walt Disney Company’s Hulu + Live TV, which closed today.

headline: Disney folds Hulu + Live TV into Fubo
summary: Disney takes 70% interest in the sports-focused channel, which becomes the nation's sixth largest pay-TV service with nearly 6 million domestic subscribers.

headline: GM layoffs, Disney's majority Fubo stake, Adidas's weak sales
summary: In this Market Minute, Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman examines three of the top stories on Wall Street: General Motors' (GM) reported layoffs, Disney's (DIS) Fubo (FUBO) deal, and weak Adidas (ADS.DE) sales. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Fubo, Disney’s Hulu + Live TV Complete Business Combination, Creating Unique Consumer Focused vMVPD
summary: NEW YORK & BURBANK, Calif., October 29, 2025--FuboTV Inc. (NYSE: FUBO) and The Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) today announced they have closed the previously announced transaction to combine Fubo’s business with Disney’s Hulu + Live TV business (the "Transaction").

raw.headline: Fubo, Disney’s Hulu + Live TV Complete Business Combination, Creating Unique Consumer Focused vMVPD

headline: NETWORK MEDIA GROUP ANNOUNCES CHANGE TO BOARD
summary: Network Media Group Inc. (TSXV: NTE) (OTC: NETWF) ("Network" or the "Company") today announces that Ali Pejman has retired as Chairman of the Board of Directors, effective immediately.
